snippet.title: Game Gear Longplay [101] Cutthroat Island
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Segafan

This version of this game is really bad, the duels with the pirates are so easy if you pay attention or else they kill you in few seconds, but the controls are worse when you have to jump and in the cave level you have only to jump! The level design is bad, the game is repetitive (duels with simple enemies and bosse ) and frustrating (especially the jumps) and all the experince is boring. Tie-ins of good movies are bad games, with some exceptions in this case we have flop movie = flop game. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
